name: Saper Hentai
description:
Banzai Hentai-Pieces are already scattered randomly. By clicking on the blocks, you can move it in the direction of the free cell. Try to arrange them in order using the least number of moves.

Features:

  • 10 levels
  • Nice author's graphics
  • Relaxing background music
  • Gallery

All girls over 18 years old
